show_name: Darker than Black: Gemini of the Meteor (TV)
other_title: DARKER THAN BLACK 流星の双子（ジェミニ）- (Japanese)
Darker than Black: Ryūsei no Gemini
Темнее Черного: Близнецы и Падающая Звезда (Russian)
plot: Two years have passed since Hei and Yin escaped the Syndicate after the events of the first season. Making their way to Russia, Hei encounters a young girl named Suou Pavlichenko, whose family is gradually pulled into the war between contractors and various intelligence factions. Meanwhile, Misaki Kirihara has quit her position in Foreign Affairs to begin her own investigations into Hei, the Contractors and the Syndicate.
opening_theme: "Tsukiakari no Michishirube" (ツキアカリのミチシルベ; "Guidepost of the Moonlight") by Stereopony (eps 2-)
ending_theme: "From Dusk Till Dawn" by abingdon boys school
